snippet: In testimony prepared for a Senate Banking Committee hearing to be held on Wednesday, Jamie Dimon sounded a note of contrition, but also emphasized the strength of the bank.
abstract: In testimony prepared for a Senate Banking Committee hearing to be held on Wednesday, Jamie Dimon sounded a note of contrition, but also emphasized the strength of the bank.

headline.main: JPMorgan Chief Says Huge Trading Loss Was 'Isolated Event'
